feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.10
entry.content:
Fixes

  • [Recovery Key] When utilized, it is fixed where itâ€™s still valid. Prior, would clear and user would not know to create a new recovery key and be locked out if password were to fail again.
  • [Recovery Key] Added brute force prevention. If the user enters the recovery key incorrectly 3 times, they must wait 15 minutes to re-enter it again
  • [Whisparr v2/3] Now has individual state management
  • [State Management] Each multi-instance now has its own state management
  • [Swaparr] If Swaparr is disabled, then each of the Swaparr settings for each of the apps is disabled and hidden (instead of being disabled)
  • [Huntarr] All pages auto-refresh to ensure that the correct values are shown

Tracking Next

  • [Settings] Fix Plex Setup Login

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.11
entry.content: • [Plex] Fixed Plex LOGIN via the user page, the setup page, and login page

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.12
entry.content:
• [Swappar] Able to change sleep time
  • [Swappar] Removed useless hover effect that caused a slight, annoying visual shift
  • [Apps] Removed useless hover effect that caused a slight, annoying visual shift

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.13
entry.content:
• [Swappar] Everything properly saves and added save button
  • [Note] Working to restore save buttons and remove auto-save

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.14
entry.content:
• [Settings] Auto-saved removed and save button added
  • [Notifications] Auto-saved removed and save button added
  • [Note] Continuing to remove auto-save for other areas
